overview: Our Treasure Island Media team in Mexico are incredible and passionate. They scour every place from the biggest cities to tiny remote villages to find the most virile studs and the hungriest man-whores Mexico has to offer. Their first film — Mecos (Cum) — was an instant hit. And with Mexican Cumwhores they’ve really hit their stride. You’ll see total fucking passion in these men. Sex so direct and primal that it breaks through our preconceptions of how men get pleasure from each other. There’s nothing programmed or directed here — this is glorious sunny fire-blooded manhood at its rawest and best. You’re gonna enjoy this one.
title: Mexican Cumwhores
